is it "feed" or "feeds"?

from blog.golang.org, when i clicked "Posts (Atom)", i was taken to:
http://blog.golang.org/feeds/posts/default

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.blog
